document_data.name: Gilded Spur
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gilded Spur''' was an inn in [[Amnwater]], [[Amn]].
document_data.Services: The establishment offered gambling facilities aimed at the passing caravan trade, but this made it less popular with locals.
document_data.Inhabitants: The hostess was [[Krigar]], whose lover was the proprietor, Lord [[Jhanos Yhliivast]].
document_data.History: As of [[1368 DR]], it was the largest and the newest inn in Amnwater, owned and operated by the [[Yhliivast]] family.
